content.p: Trusted Research applies to anyone who has international collaborations. It is particularly relevant to researchers in: Back to the top > If you are currently a research colleague at the university, you can access guidance and training materials in our Trusted Research toolkit. This guidance includes videos from the Cabinet Office of relevant case studies. Access the Trusted Research toolkit > All resources are available to current university staff only. Before you undertake any research or knowledge exchange activity that involves international partners or collaborators, you must: Once the project notification form is submitted, the Trusted Research team will review all information, and: Email Trusted-Research@nottingham.ac.uk to get in touch. We acknowledge the Trusted Research Guidance for Academia in developing our processes. Learn more about ethics and integrity
